Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Cantarini, with in the centre foreground the seated Virgin with Christ Child lying on her lap wih his arms outstretched, and St Joseph sitting on the left and looking on; before letter Stipple, etching and engraving, on chine collé
Curator's comments: Engraved after a painting which is now in the Louvre (inv. 175), for another (kept under Guido Reni to whom the picture was traditionally attributed) see 1856,0712.464/ PPA240966.
